item.title: Plugging Open Policy Agent into Envoy
item.description: Photo by Kutan Ural on Unsplash Envoy & Open Policy Agent This is the 3rd Envory & Open Policy Agent Getting Started Guide. Each guide is intended to explore a single feature and walk through a simple implementation. Each guide builds on the concepts explored in the previous guide to build a very powerful authorization services by the end of the series. Here is a list of the Getting Started Guides that are currently available.
